channel.title: Horror-Scape 508 Development Team
channel.description:
[center][img]http://i1190.photobucket.com/albums/z451/Horror-Scape/horror-scapebanner.png?t=1293809469[/img][/center] [center][size=24pt]Horror-Scape Development Team[/size][/center]
Source:Mezzy-Scape
[size=12pt]What were looking for: 1.A website developer (Taken by sean) 2.A great person who is familiar with 508 coding and has teamviewer. (still open and desperately in need of one or 2) 3.Gfx designers 4.Someone familiar with making webclients (OPEN) 5. Was going to be vps but recently someone decided to pay for that so we have a 1gb vps [/size]
[size=12pt]What we have already fixed: 1.Pvp is now pk 2.Almost done with sellable shops[/size]
[size=12pt]Goals: * To develop and publicize a well organized & professional server. * To develop my administrating skills and overall organization of a site & server. * To make a mark in the private server world by introducing unseen & exclusive features. * To dedicate myself fully to the server, to keep things stable and organized. * I want it to be a learning process for us, and help built up our communication & coding abilities.[/size]
[size=12pt]Pictures? [/size]
[img]http://i1190.photobucket.com/albums/z451/Horror-Scape/droppartyftw.png?t=1293810072[/img]
[img]http://i1190.photobucket.com/albums/z451/Horror-Scape/party.png?t=1293810105[/img]
[img]http://i1190.photobucket.com/albums/z451/Horror-Scape/barrage.png?t=1293810150[/img] [size=14pt] I tried to make a web client but it failed this is what i had:[/size] [img]http://i1190.photobucket.com/albums/z451/Horror-Scape/thestuff.png?t=1293810233[/img] [size=14pt] When i ran i got this error:[/size] [img]http://i1190.photobucket.com/albums/z451/Horror-Scape/Webclientfail.png?t=1293810277[/img]

item.title: Horror-Scape 508 Development Team
item.dc:creator: @nolzan nolzan
item.description:
@nolzan wrote:

Thank you im having thoughts of shutting it down though…in desperate need of help.

item.title: Horror-Scape 508 Development Team
item.dc:creator: @_Pandemonium `Pandemonium
item.description:
@_Pandemonium wrote:

[quote=“nolzan, post:4, topic:376094”]I have been trying to fix all the things that weren’t fixed on his source to make it different.
I have taken out the pvp drops and put old pk where it drops items that were worn.
I’m working on player stock shops so people can sell.
And i need to fix barrage glitch and dueling glitch.
And quest.
Sorry if it looks leeched but thanks for the good luck.
;D[/quote]

Fixing glitches isn’t making it different.

Read full topic

item.title: Horror-Scape 508 Development Team
item.dc:creator: @nolzan nolzan
item.description:
@nolzan wrote:

I have been trying to fix all the things that weren’t fixed on his source to make it different.
I have taken out the pvp drops and put old pk where it drops items that were worn.
I’m working on player stock shops so people can sell.
And i need to fix barrage glitch and dueling glitch.
And quest.
Sorry if it looks leeched but thanks for the good luck.
;D

Read full topic

item.title: Horror-Scape 508 Development Team
item.dc:creator: @nolzan nolzan
item.description:
@nolzan wrote:

[center][/center]
[center][size=24pt]Horror-Scape Development Team[/size][/center]

Source:Mezzy-Scape

[size=12pt]What were looking for:
1.A website developer (Taken by sean)
2.A great person who is familiar with 508 coding and has teamviewer. (still open and desperately in need of one or 2)
3.Gfx designers
4.Someone familiar with making webclients (OPEN)
5. Was going to be vps but recently someone decided to pay for that so we have a 1gb vps
[/size]

[size=12pt]What we have already fixed:
1.Pvp is now pk
2.Almost done with sellable shops[/size]

[size=12pt]Goals:
* To develop and publicize a well organized & professional server.
* To develop my administrating skills and overall organization of a site & server.
* To make a mark in the private server world by introducing unseen & exclusive features.
* To dedicate myself fully to the server, to keep things stable and organized.
* I want it to be a learning process for us, and help built up our communication & coding abilities.[/size]

[size=12pt]Pictures?
[/size]
